meanings.sent1: The muddy dog bedirtied the clean carpet.
meanings.sent2: She bedirtied her hands while gardening.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy bedirtied the entire room with its muddy paws.
meanings.sent4: The storm bedirtied the once pristine landscape with mud and debris.
meanings.sent5: The careless child bedirtied their clothes while playing in the dirt.

meanings.sent1: The bedirtied shoes left muddy footprints on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The bedirtied windows obscured the view outside.
meanings.sent3: The bedirtied cat looked quite pleased with itself after rolling in the dirt.
meanings.sent4: The bedirtied walls of the old house seemed to whisper stories of neglect.
meanings.sent5: The bedirtied dishes in the sink attracted flies with their foul smell.
